sense.def:
Kar je
good
, je prijetno, sprejemljivo ali zadovoljivo.

seg.quote: They had a good time.
Hello! It's good to see you.
...a very good school.
She speaks good English.
Both policies make good sense.
It's good that there are places like this.

sense.def:
To be in a good mood
pomeni biti vesel in razpoložen za druženje.

To be good at something
pomeni biti spreten in uspešen v nečem.

seg.quote: Alex is a good swimmer.
Marcus was good with his hands.
You were never any good at Latin.

sense.def:
Kdor je
good
, je prijazen in pozoren.

seg.quote: He's always been good to me.
It's good of you to come.

sense.def:
Z izrazom
good
opišemo osebo, katere vedênje in pristop sta moralno primerna.

seg.quote: There was no trace of evil in her—she was good.

sense.def:
Otrok ali žival, ki je
good
, se lepo vede.

seg.quote: Were the kids good?

sense.def:
Good
je moralna in verska primernost.

seg.quote: ...the conflict between good and evil.

sense.def:
Kadar je nekaj storjeno
for the good of a person or organization
, je storjeno v korist neke osebe ali organizacije.

seg.quote: Casey should quit for the good of the agency.
It was for her own good.

sense.def:
Izraz
good
uporabljamo z nikalnico
no
, kadar rečemo, da nekaj ne bo uspešno ali ne bo za rabo.

seg.quote: It's no good worrying any more tonight.
Even if I came, what good would it do?

sense.def:
Z izrazom
good
poudarimo razpon ali stopnjo nečesa.

seg.quote: He took a good long look at it.
...a good while ago.

sense.def:
Goods
so predmeti, izdelani za prodajo.

seg.quote: ...a wide range of electrical goods.

sense.def:
Če rečemo
it's a good thing
ali
it's a good job
, hočemo povedati, da se nam zdi v redu, da je nekaj tako, kot je.

seg.quote: It's a good thing I wasn't there.

sense.def:
Ljudje z izrazom
good for you
pokažejo odobravanje.

Kadar se nekaj zgodi
for good
, se okoliščine, ki jih povzroči, ne bodo nikoli spremenile.

seg.quote: They had gone for good.

sense.def:
Izraz
as good as
postavimo pred pridevnik ali glagol, kadar hočemo povedati, da je nekaj skoraj res.

seg.quote: Without her glasses she was as good as blind.
He had as good as abdicated.

sense.def:
To make good some damage or a loss
pomeni popraviti škodo ali nadomestiti izgubljeno.

To deliver the goods
ali
to come up with the goods
pomeni storiti tisto, kar od nas pričakujejo.

seg.quote: Such an unwieldy system is unable to deliver the goods.
